name: Akshat Shukla
about: I am a final year undergraduate pursuing a B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering at Indian Institute of Technology Kharagpur. Skilled in C,C++, Python, PyTorch, Data, NodeJs, ReactJs, AngularJs, IonicJs, Javascript, Web-scraping, HTML, CSS, and Competitive Programming.

experience.title: Core Team Member
experience.description: • Worked in a team of 10+ on three fronts - Solution Ideation, Product Design, and Website Management• Mentored a team of 12 Freshers for Open IIT Product Design conducted by Technology Students Gymkhana, IIT Kharagpur• Developed a website for internal team management and assignment allocation for the society
experience.description_html: • Worked in a team of 10+ on three fronts - Solution Ideation, Product Design, and Website Management• Mentored a team of 12 Freshers for Open IIT Product Design conducted by Technology Students Gymkhana, IIT Kharagpur• Developed a website for internal team management and assignment allocation for the society <!---->

experience.title: Web Development Intern
experience.description: • Worked to develop Virtual Disinfection Management and Control System to contain the spread of Covid-19 • Modeled a web interface to allow clients to access live locations of sanitation devices and areas covered with a complete history of disinfection orders.• Developed a Python script to cluster multiple location points of disinfection device from IoTs using DBSCAN to get an area data point for optimized storage • Contributed to an Ionic App to keep track of body temperatures of client's employees by using a temperature scanner.
experience.description_html: • Worked to develop Virtual Disinfection Management and Control System to contain the spread of Covid-19 • Modeled a web interface to allow clients to access live locations of sanitation devices and areas covered with a complete history of disinfection orders.• Developed a Python script to cluster multiple location points of disinfection device from IoTs using DBSCAN to get an area data point for optimized storage • Contributed to an Ionic App to keep track of body temperatures of client's employees by using a temperature scanner.
